abstrac: Build the website of your dreams.
bio:
Comprised of a group of highly creative designers and developers with over a decade of experience in UI Designing, eCommerce solution and other related facets coupled with international partner offices, we are an expert digital agency providing web solutions for a wide range of businesses globally.

Our services include web designing, eCommerce Solution, Logo Design, content management systems, search engine optimization, graphic designing, online marketing & digital solutions.

Availability: We have excellent communication skills and we are available on Email,Chat via messengers (gtalk, yahoo, skype),Phone. We stress on regular communication of updates.

abstrac: Building Creative Brand Equity for Web and Print
bio:
Creating unique design solutions for companies large and small. 

A  pro with over 15 years of experience in both web design/development and graphic design, I’m always eager to stretch the envelope for my clients. 

I create responsive websites using Adobe Business Catalyst, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, Foundation, WordPress and Adobe Muse. I have also done work on PHP, ASP platforms in addition to UI work for applications. 

I've created custom responsive email campaigns in HTML and MailChimp, Constant Contact and Campaign Monitor. My graphic design work covers packaging design, logo/branding and infographics.

Design is the cornerstone of good communication and I work hard to help my clients express their marketing message through the process of design. 

Good design isn’t just for big business, clients both large and small can realize the benefit of quality design in their bottom line.

• Payment Method:
All transactions are made exclusively through Guru's SafePay Escrow. I only work with employers who agree to the Escrow service.


• Terms: Escrow funding in full prior to beginning the project. I request a deposit release from escrow (generally 1/2 of the total project cost) in order to begin work on a project. Balance is due upon  completion.

• Communication:
All communication with employers can be handled via e-mail or phone. On specific projects that may entail conversations daily, twice daily or weekly. The amount may vary by project. I generally prefer an initial conversation to get the project underway and I follow up with a confirmation of the guidelines for the project.


• General Availability:
Work hours are 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Monday through Friday (Eastern time).


• Feedback/Endorsement:
To build up my rank on Guru.com, I need to earn positive feedback from my employers. I would very much appreciate my employers leaving feedback.

bio:
AWARD PROJECT!

Step 1: Concept sketches delivered.
> 3 rounds of edits.

Step 2: Approved sketches Colored
> 3 round of edits.

Step 3: Payments released > Final files released.

PAYMENT TERMS

Option 1 (Large projects)
Fully funded escrow payments.

Option 2 (Small graphics/Illustrations)
Full payment after color approval.

Option 3 (Usually for Children books or projects with series of illustrations)
30% after all sketch approval.
70% after all color approval.

All final files will be released only after full payments or release of escrow funds.

bio:
My aim is to be one of the dependable GURU that provides excellent quality of work. I am very proficient to work with and ensure to save my client's valuable opportunities from being wasted. I always follow this Quality, Time, and client satisfaction. I am committed to providing excellent and fast service with 100% accuracy of work all the time.

I am a passionate, fast learner, and a hardworking freelancer. I always promise to save my clients time reputations. I really love to work in a challenging environment; I assure you will always be satisfied with my work.

Services offered:
- Accurately key data in a timely manner
- Capture data from electronic images or paper for delivery to the customer
- Data Entry (All Type)
- Data Collection/Data Mining/Data Processing
- Web Research/Web Scraping
- Converting raw data into useful information 
- Search Google for Specific Company's Website and details
- Lead Generation
- Skip Tracing
- Products posting
- PDF Editing/Conversion
- Market Research
- Manual Email Collection from different website
- Microsoft Office
- Photoshop (Photo Editing, Background Transparent/remove, clipping Path etc)
- Upload products to your Shopping Website
- Enter data consisting of alpha and numeric keying
- Manual entering and verification of data records & any kinds of Data Entry projects. 

I am seeking part-time or full-time data entry and admin support related jobs with flexible working hours. You will definitely be satisfied with my exceptional service.

It would be a pleasure to have an interview with you, and I look forward to hearing from you soon. And I can work as soon as possible.

Thank you.
We are supporting 24/7 and want to work according to the terms of guru. Flexible with All Time Zones. Quality Support Reports! Daily Detailed Reports and Weekly Reports with needed everything.

bio:
**TOP QUALITY RESULTS **|| English - Spanish Translation & Localization Expert

I’m a Native Spanish Certified Localization & Translation expert having 10+ years of experience in localizing digital products and have served clients across the globe to provide accurate and high-quality services.

My highly-rated profile and top test results are the living proof that any project I work on is going to end up with a top-quality result, which is, no other thing that what you deserve for your money.

My experience in translation & localization includes:

? Website Translation - Beetronics, Canary Ride, Athlete Analyzer, Sales Manago Marketing Automation, Smart Mockups.
? Apps Localization - Facetune2, Forest, Sleep Town, Panda Video Compressor, PackageX, MoonX.
? Course Content Localization - Blackford Centre, Novo Learning.
? Videogames - Pokemon Origins, Pokemon Ultra Moon (3DS), Monsters carniva, Vixen Clash, Wet'n Wild, Fap CEO.
? Blogs - Sales Manago Marketing Automation
? Software
? E-books
? Marketing Material

I have knowledge in various areas including Technology, Travel, Medicine, Marketing and others. In whichever field you work alongside me, you can expect:

? Passionate and creative approach to the Job
? Prompt Communication
? Full dedication & Motivation to Complete the Task
? Fast & consistent on every projects
? Deadline meeting at all times.

The last but not least, I work with different formats and programs and systems such as:

- Crowdin, html, Lokalise, WPML for Wordpress, Indesign files, json, word, 
  powerpoint,Excel. 

Thank you for taking the time to read my profile. I am looking forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Jose
